label: DRVA Direction of radial velocity of water current relative to instrument and to True North by high frequency radar
definition: The compass direction in degrees positive clockwise from TrueNorth of the component of water velocity in a water body along radial lines centered at the HFR antenna.
comment: Radial velocity (away from) of water current related to instrument; direction -> plane angle, relative to True North -> relative to True North
hasObjectOfInterest: RDVA radial velocity (away from) of water current related to instrument
